Description: Up for sale is a hard to find ASAT in good condition with a new aftermarket hardshell case. There are NO known issues and it was recently professionally set-up by a local tech. I am currently running .11 strings tuned down 1/2 step. There is normal wear like pick marks on the guard and a very minor ding on the back of the neck. As I mentioned, there are no issues and this guitar plays great with typical G&L tone. I have also been very impressed with the quality of this import guitar. If you have any questions or want to see any other images, please don't hesitate to ask. Of course, I will take the upmost care to package the guitar. Thanks for looking and buy with confidence as I have a great record and feedback.  SPECS:• CONSTRUCTION: bolt-on• SCALE: 25 1/2"• PICKUPS: Leo Fender†-designed G&L MFD™ single coils made in Fullerton, California• BODY WOOD: Ash• NECK WOOD: Rosewood fingerboard• NECK WIDTH AT NUT: 1 5/8"• NECK RADIUS: 9"• NECK PROFILE: medium C• FRETS: 22 medium jumbo, nickel• TUNING KEYS: 18:1 ratio, sealed-back• BRIDGE: traditional boxed-steel bridge with individual brass saddles• CONTROLS: 3-position pickup selector, volume, tone NO INTERNATIONAL SALES. CONTINENTAL US ONLY.
Title: G&L Tribute ASAT Special Electric Guitar
